pages.text: The purple notebook that lists the patterns etched into amethysts mentions a certain kind of staff required for the art, but not how to make one. After looking at magenta pigment, I was struck with inspiration - I may well have a way to acquire such staves, now.

pages.title: Hex Casting
pages.text: With a staff in hand, and the notebook as my reference, I begin to unravel the magenta gems' secrets. This art seems very capable indeed, should I have the patience.
